WorkItem.Description:
I want to be able to style the DataGridTextColumn, DataGridComboBoxColumn, DataGridCheckBoxColumn and DataGridHyperlinkColumn so that they follow the solution theme. The TextBox, ComboBox, CheckBox and TextBlock elements that are displayed use standard windows styled elements - not my own default styles.

It appears that they do not derive from FrameworkElement (or FrameworkContentElement) and therefore don't support styling.

Please can the ability to style these columns be added?
WorkItem.Summary: Can't style DataGridTextColumn, DataGridComboBoxColumn, DataGridCheckBoxColumn and DataGridHyperlinkColumn
